query:
SELECT 
  i.id,
  i.name,
  i.cost_per_unit,
  u.name as unit_name,
  i.unit as unit_id,
  i.category
FROM ingredients i
LEFT JOIN ingredientUnits u ON i.unit = u.id
WHERE i.category IN ('Seafood', 'Fish', 'Meat', 'Protein')
   OR i.name LIKE '%Tuna%'
   OR i.name LIKE '%Salmon%'
   OR i.name LIKE '%Scallop%'
   OR i.name LIKE '%Yellowtail%'
   OR i.name LIKE '%Albacore%'
   OR i.name LIKE '%Shrimp%'
   OR i.name LIKE '%Crab%'
   OR i.name LIKE '%Eel%'
ORDER BY i.name;
